### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60, y=-60)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=60, y=-60) 

### Pipe network at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  PipeGroup (fluid_system=146222, position=x=105.5 y=-32.5)
-  PipeGroup (fluid_system=146221, position=x=107.5 y=-34.5)

### Electricity network at position(x=112.5, y=-24.5)
Consists of following entities
-  ElectricityGroup (id=577868, poles=[(x=112.5,y=-24.5),(x=111.5,y=-30.5),(x=111.5,y=-27.5)])
-  ElectricityGroup (id=577870, poles=[(x=120.5,y=-26.5)])

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
### Errors when checking entity status
- Ensure the entity status is correctly checked, for example, EntityStatus.NO_SPACE is not a valid status for a furnace

### NAMESPACE
* Defined functions: None
* Assigned variables: 
  - coal_in_inventory (int)
  - furnace (Entity)
  - space_for_coal (int)
  - EntityStatus (enum) 
  - Inventory (class) 
  - Position (class) 
  - Direction (enum) 
  - Entity (class)
